alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Hale; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:47PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Perry, central Hale and southwestern Bibb Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 547 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Wedgeworth to 6 miles northwest of Heiberger to near Uniontown. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marion, Greensboro, Uniontown, Akron, Newbern, Vaiden, Mertz, Sawyerville, Heiberger, Wedgeworth, Evansville, Perry County Correctional Center, Judson College, Morgan Springs, Folsom, Wateroak, Harper Hill, Vaiden Field Airport, Ellards and Havana. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
